mapper.select: SELECT id FROM sys_comp WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND status = 0 AND del_flag = 0
mapper.sql: SELECT c.id, c.parent_id, c.name,c.type, c.order_num,c.status,c.create_time,c.full_name,c.area_ids,c.tenant_id, c.parent_ids,c.code, (SELECT NAME FROM sys_comp d WHERE d.id = c.parent_id) AS parent_name FROM sys_comp c
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(d.id, d.name) AS name FROM sys_comp d LEFT JOIN sys_role_dept rd ON d.id = rd.dept_id WHERE d.del_flag = '0' AND rd.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY d.parent_id, d.order_num
